Class SwingFileFilter<T>

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
com.dua3.utility.swing.SwingFileFilter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the generic parameter for FileType
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileFilter, FilenameFilter
public final class SwingFileFilter<T> extends FileFilter implements FileFilter, FilenameFilter
A FileFilter class to be used as a drop-in file filter for dialogs.

This class can be used in all cases where one of the three standard Java file filter implementations is required, namely:

  • java.io.FileFilter
  • java.io.FilenameFilter
  • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter

      public static <T> List<SwingFileFilter<T>> getFilters(OpenMode mode, Class<T> cls)
      Returns a list of SwingFileFilters based on the given OpenMode and class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic parameter for FileType
      Parameters:
      mode - the OpenMode to determine the filters for
      cls - the class type to filter
      Returns:
      a list of SwingFileFilters with the specified mode and class
